page.title: 13Amy's Diary (continued)
page.content: 5.30pm. We came home and had some tea. For tea I had some baked beans on toast and then some ice cream. 6.30pm. I went out to play with Paul who lives next door, and Kelly and Ben who live up the road. Dad and Ian (Kelly's and Ben's dad) also played. The boys wanted to play football so we did. After that Kelly and I played rounders. Rebecca, my sister,and Georgia and Huw, my cousins, joined us. 8.30pm. Kelly, Ben and Paul went home and the rest of us went to Grandma's house. She lives next door to Paul. We stayed there and I watched T.V. 10.45pm. We came home and went to bed.
